title: The glory of old England ...
publisher: printed upon the ice, on the River Thames, February the 18th
description: Engraving showing the statue of Queen Anne at Blenhiem Palace (in background), and text of inscription by Sarah Marlborough, dated 1738, with imprint: London, Printed & published ... by R. Walker, in Fleet Lane.
With verse: Behold the liquid Thames now frozen o'er ...
titleStatement: The glory of old England ... / William Bailey
contributor: Marlborough, Sarah Jennings Churchill, Duchess of, 1660-1744.
